name: Kevin Ponto
content: Home | Kevin Ponto Kevin Ponto Professor, University of Wisconsin-Madison Light Dark I am a professor in at the Wisconsin Institute for Discovery (WID) and in the Design Studies Department in The School of Human Ecology at the University of Wisconsin-Madison. My research revolves around the utilization of virtual, mixed and augmented reality to simulate the experience of real-life spaces for real-world outcomes. My long-term goal is to develop new technologies, tools and methods to bridge the physical/digital divide.
